headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Issi Classic Series
content: Itâ€™s the most stirring sight in the San Andreas racing calendar: thirty battle-scarred, utterly focused racers take their seats in thirty small British compact classics, and a few seconds later history is made. In these brand new races nothing is certain except that chances will be taken, turbos will be charged, death will be defied, glory will be seized, and pants will be frequently changed: the only place to be is behind a wheel.
